description: The Skog product line is made of a Merino/Tencel yarn, knitted in a single jersey quality. TENCEL is branded lyocell and modal fiber that is produced by environmentally responsible processes from the sustainably sourced natural raw material wood. Mixed with fine Merino, it makes the fiber stronger, while maintaining the breathability of wool. The Skog Tee is a regular fit t-shirt which is a great staple for your wardrobe, all year. Comes in the basic colors, as well as some seasonal colors to be paired with the shorts this Summer.
name: We Norwegians Skog Tee - Mens
